title: Water Bottle Single / One Arm Tricep Kickbacks/Kick Backs
description: Holding a pair of water bottles with an overhand grip, stand tall with your chest up and core braced. Bend at the hips while keeping your back completely flat. Once your upper body is parallel with the floor, bring your upper arms to your sides. Begin by pushing the water bottles back and behind you. Pause at the top of the movement and feel the contraction in your triceps. Slowly lower the water bottles and begin again.
